translation: He attains peace into whom all desires enter, just as waters enter the ocean which, filled from all sides, remains unmoved; but not the man who is full of desires.
commentary: 2.70 filled from all sides? Achalpratishtham based in stillness? The sea ocean? Apa: water? enter enter? as in as? Likewise so? Desires desires? Yam whom? enter enter? All all? He he? peace peace? Apnoti attains? Not not? Kamakami desirer of desires.Commentary Just as the ocean filled with waters from all sides remains unmoved? so also the sage who is resting in his own Svarupa
